::SnowCat::

She turned her head and saw the bot getting closer.  She then 
stopped.  With the speed the bot was heading at her with, he would 
fly over her head, she thought. She then banked left and ran.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe::
> 
> DeathScythe growls as the shot barely misses his head, grazing his 
shoulder. 
> This bot was going to die a slow death....
> 
> He speeds up, gaining on the bot he was chasing. His mouth opens, 
showing the 
> horrid collection of teeth of different species, ready to bite down 
on his 
> victim as soon as he caugh up to it.
